title: FT: Matty White Cap hand cut scrap SGC A - SOLD
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: FT: Matty White Cap hand cut scrap SGC A - SOLD
posts.post_content:
PENDING

Very cool card.

Recently acquired this realizing that it’s almost positively a handcut scrap card. There was an additional Wajo Portrait that was also in the auction with the same back (SC150/30) and had oversized borders left to right which was also a handcut card. I think it’s possible they came from the same sheet as they were graded together (sequential SGC numbers).

Anyway, I’m looking to trade this for other T206’s as it doesn’t really fit my collection. And if you have any EPDGs I need, I’m definitely listening

I’m pretty open to offers, so shoot me a PM.

For pricing, $SOLD

[IMG]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/47105750324_753e3fc96a_b.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/47895011891_33e63895a7_b.jpg[/IMG]

Ttt

Card still available.  Added a price also
